text: is a village in Fukushima, Japan. It is in the Futaba District and is close to Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant. After the March 11 disasters, the town offices moved to Aizubange, Fukushima. On 15 June 2011, the offices moved again to Miharu, Fukushima. ==Other websites== Category:Villages in Fukushima Prefecture
title: Katsurao, Fukushima
